title: About
main_text:
I believe that every person is born with talent. Maya Angelou

Retin.ae is the collective unconscious, a shared space between what we see and understand.

Retin.ae encourages imagination by selecting, commissioning and making it easy for you to access films, video, literature and art.

This edition is designed to locate new talent. We have provided selections of literature to inspire you and for you to reinterpret. So, if you are a filmmaker, musician, actor, future executive, marketer, graphic designer, visual artist, writer, or if you know someone who is, then take a look at our talent page and see how we can feature your work, collaborate or commission you.

Experience. Interpretation. Creation.

Use the menu to browse.
